text: Waqar Ahmad Shah (6 July 1943 â€“ 15 April 2018) was an Indian politician. He was born in Qazipura North Bahraich, India. He served in the Legislative Assembly of India for multiple districts from 1993 to 2017. He served as a cabinet minister under the administrations of Presidents A. P. J. Abdul Kalam and Pranab Mukherjee. Shah died of bladder cancer on 15 April 2018 at a hospital in Lucknow, India at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Politicians from Uttar Pradesh
title: Waqar Ahmad Shah
